string-array.name: java_quiz_questions
string-array.item: Which one of these lists contains only Java programming language keywords?
Which is a valid keyword in java?
Which is the valid declarations within an interface definition?
Which one is a valid declaration of a boolean?
What is the numerical range of a char?
What is the name of the method used to start a thread execution?
Which of the following line of code is suitable to start a thread ?
Which of the following would compile without error?

Which statement is true given the following?
Double d = Math.random();
The expression str.length returns the length (number of characters) contained in str, a String object
Which of the following methods can be used to remove a java.awt.Component object from the display?
The setBackground() method is part of the following class in java.awt package:
Which are the valid ways to create DataInputStream streams?

string-array.name: java_quiz_option1
string-array.item: class, if, void, long, Int, continue
A static method cannot be synchronized

string-array.name: java_quiz_option2
string-array.item: goto, instanceof, native, finally, default, throws
If a class has synchronized code, multiple threads can still access the nonsynchronized code

string-array.name: java_quiz_option3
string-array.item: try, virtual, throw, final, volatile, transient
X run = new X(); Thread t = new Thread(run); t.start();
Variables can be protected from concurrent access problems by marking them with the synchronized keyword

string-array.name: java_quiz_option4
string-array.item: When a thread sleeps, it releases its locks

string-array.name: c_quiz_questions
string-array.item: Specify the 2 library functions to dynamically allocate memory?
Which of the following cannot be checked in a switch-case statement?
What is the only function all C programs must contain?
Which of the following is not a correct variable type?
What does the following declaration mean? int[*ptr][10]
How many times is a do while loop guaranteed to loop?
What will you do to treat the constant 3.14 as a long double?
What variables stores the number of arguments to a program?
What does the argument count variable store?
Which of the following reads in a string named x with one hundred characters?
Which of the following is a complete function?
Which of the following is a properly defined struct?
What is the purpose of fflush() function

string-array.name: c_quiz_option1
string-array.item: ptr is array of pointers to 10 integers
flushes all streams and specified streams

string-array.name: c_quiz_option2
string-array.item: ptr is a pointer to an array of 10 integers
The number of arguments plus one

string-array.name: c_quiz_option3
string-array.item: ptr is an array of 10 integers
The number of arguments minus one

string-array.name: c_quiz_option4
string-array.item: ptr is an pointer to array
The total size of the argument array

string-array.item: To replace paragraphs. i.e. p tags
Used to separate cell walls from their contents

string-array.item: There is no such thing as an <iframe>
Used to set space between cells
Common graphic format on the Web.

string-array.item: A company that provides access to the Internet

string-array.name: sql_quiz_questions
string-array.item: Course(course_id,sec_id,semester) .Here the course_id,sec_id and semester are __________ and course is a _________ .
Select * from employee . What type of statement is this?
Which one of the following is a set of one or more attributes taken collectively to uniquely identify a record?
Insert into employee _____ (1002,Joey,2000); In the given query which of the keyword has to be inserted ?
Using the ______ clause retains only one copy of such identical tuples.
Which of the join operations do not preserve non matched tuples.
In order to undo the work of transaction after last commit which one should be used ?
Which of the following is used to access the database server at time of executing the program and get the data from the server accordingly ?
Updating the value of the view
_________ are useful in SQL update statements,where they can be used in the set clause.
A technique for direct search is
The ___________ operation, denoted by −, allows us to find tuples that are in one relation but are not in another.
Foreign key is the one in which the ________ of one relation is referenced in another relation.

string-array.name: sql_quiz_option1
string-array.item: Will affect the relation from which it is defined

string-array.name: sql_quiz_option2
string-array.item: Will not change the view definition

string-array.name: sql_quiz_option3
string-array.item: Will not affect the relation from which it is defined
